name: Canto

name: TempCanto

name: Canto+

name: Flying

desc: Can fly.

desc: recoil = damage dealt

name: Devil Reversal
desc: recoil = damage dealt

name: Close Counter

name: Lucktaker
desc:
Grants +2 LCK after defeating a foe (max +10).
Resets on end chapter.

name: Bronze Dagger
desc: Inflicts SKL/DEF/RES -1.

name: Iron Dagger
desc: Inflicts MAG -1, DEF/RES-2.

name: Steel Dagger
desc: Inflicts STR/DEF/RES -2.

desc: Inflicts STR/MAG/DEF/RES -3.

name: Hexed

Inflicts STR/MAG/SKL/SPD/DEF/RES-3.
(Recovers 1/turn).

name: Poisoned
desc: Unit receives 1-5 dmg at the beginning of each turn.

name: Napping
desc: Unit is asleep, wakes up after combat.

name: Sleep
desc: Unit is asleep.

name: Stunned
desc: Unit cannot act.

name: Petrify
desc: Unit is petrified. Cannot avoid enemy attacks and suffers -30 dodge.

name: Frigid
desc: Inflicts SPD-3/MOV-1.

name: Chilled
desc: Once 3 stacks are accumulated, unit will be frozen.
components: len([skill for skill in unit.skills if skill.nid == 'Chilled']) > 2

name: Frozen
desc: Unit is frozen. Cannot avoid enemy attacks or act.

name: Silenced
desc: Unit cannot use magic.

name: Berserk
desc: Unit is confused and can no longer tell friend from foe.

If unit's class can use anima, but not light magic,

desc: Grants MAG+3 for 1 turn.

desc: Grants MOV+1 for 1 turn.

name: Healtouch
desc: Heal +10 HP when healing an ally.
components: 10 if target and unit is not target and skill_system.check_ally(unit, target) else 0

name: Augment
desc: Unit's healing staves gain +1 AoE.

name: Augment
desc: +1 AoE for healing staves.

desc: Grants RES+2/SKL+3 when healing a single ally.

desc: Grants RES+2/SKL+3 when healing a single ally.

desc: Grants RES+2/SKL+3.

Lowers target's STR by 6 after combat.
(Recovers 1/turn).

desc: Inflicts STR-6 (Recovers 1/turn).

desc:
Lowers target's MAG by 6 after combat.
(Recovers 1/turn).

desc: Inflicts MAG-6 (Recovers 1/turn).

desc:
Lowers target's SKL by 6 after combat.
(Recovers 1/turn).

Lowers target's SPD by 6 after combat.

Lowers target's DEF by 6 after combat.

name: Swordbreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid+20 if unit is using a lance vs a sword foe.

name: Lancebreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid+20 if unit is using an axe vs a lance foe.

name: Axebreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid+20 if unit is using a sword vs an axe foe.

name: Bowbreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid+20 if unit is using a tome vs a bow foe.
components: item_system.weapon_type(unit, unit.get_weapon()) in ['Anima','Light','Dark'] and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) == 'Bow'

name: Daggerbreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid+20 if unit is using a bow vs a dagger foe.

name: Tomebreaker
desc: Grants Hit/Avoid+20 if unit is using a dagger vs a tome foe.
components: item_system.weapon_type(unit, unit.get_weapon()) == 'Knife' and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) in ['Anima','Light','Dark']

name: Beastbane
desc: Units attacks are effective vs monsters.

name: Wyrmsbane
desc: Units attacks are effective vs dragons.

name: Null Flier Eff
desc: Nullifies flier effective bonuses.

name: Null Armor Eff
desc: Nullifies armor effective bonuses.

name: Null Cav Eff
desc: Nullifies cavalry effective bonuses.

name: Refresh
desc: Refresh target ally.

name: Multi Refresh
desc: Refresh all adjacent allies.

name: Swap
desc: Swap places with target ally.

name: Shove
desc: Pushes target ally 1 space away.

name: Smite
desc: Pushes target ally up to 2 spaces away.

name: Draw Back
desc: Unit and target ally move 1 space backwards.

name: Advance
desc: Unit and target ally move 1 space forwards.

name: Reposition
desc: Moves target ally to the opposite side of unit.

name: Pivot
desc: Moves unit to the opposite side of target ally.

name: Rend Heaven
desc:
Add half of foe's STR/MAG to damage (Trigger% = SKL*1.5),
if using physical/magical damage respectively.

name: Rend Heaven
components: target.get_stat('MAG')//2 if item_funcs.is_magic(unit, unit.get_weapon()) else target.get_stat('STR')//2

name: Luna
desc: Ignore half of foe's DEF/RES when attacking (Trigger% = SKL).

name: Luna
components: target.get_stat('RES')//2 if item_funcs.is_magic(unit, unit.get_weapon()) else target.get_stat('DEF')//2

name: Sol
desc: Heal half of damage dealt (Trigger% = SKL).

name: Sol
desc: Heal half of damage dealt (Trigger% = SKL ).

name: Ignis
desc: Add half of unit's DEF to damage (Trigger% = SKL).

name: Ignis
desc: Add half of unit's DEF to damage (Trigger% = SKL ).

name: Pavise
desc: Reduces sword, lance, axe and special weapon damage by half (Trigger% = SKL).
components: item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) in ['Sword','Lance','Axe'] or target.klass in ['Revenant','Entombed','Wolf']

name: Pavise
desc: Pavise

name: Aegis
desc: Reduces bow, dagger and magic damage by half (Trigger% = SKL).

name: Aegis
desc: Aegis

name: Aether
desc:
Ignore half of foe's DEF/RES when attacking and 
heal half of damage dealt (Trigger% = SKL/2).

name: Aether
desc: SolLuna
components: target.get_stat('RES')//2 if item_funcs.is_magic(unit, unit.get_weapon()) else target.get_stat('DEF')//2

name: Somnus
desc: Unit has a SKL% chance to inflict <blue>sleep</> on hit.

name: Flare
desc: Unit has a LCK% chance to add 50% of RES to damage dealt.

name: Flare
desc: Add 50% of RES to damage dealt.

name: Lucky Wallop
desc: Unit has may attack twice on a hit (Trigger% = LCK+20).

name: Premonition
desc: Unit has a chance to guarantee avoid an attack during combat (Trigger% = MAG/2).

name: Premonition
desc: Avoid.

name: Spendy Strike
desc: Combat Art: Pay 100 gold to gain +5 ATK in combat.

name: Curved Shot
desc:
Combat Art: Grants +1 range and Hit+10.
Bows only.

name: Lifetaker
desc: Heals 50% of unit's HP on kill.

name: Strengthtaker
desc:
Grants +2 STR after defeating a foe (max +10).
Resets on end chapter.

name: Strengthtaker
desc:
Grants +2 STR per stack.
Lost on end of chapter.

name: Magictaker
desc:
Grants +2 MAG after defeating a foe (max +10).
Resets on end chapter.

name: Magictaker
desc:
Grants +2 MAG per stack.
Lost on end of chapter.

name: Skilltaker
desc:
Grants +2 SKL after defeating a foe (max +10).
Resets on end chapter.

name: Skilltaker
desc:
Grants +2 SKL per stack.
Lost on end of chapter.

name: Speedtaker
desc:
Grants +2 SPD after defeating a foe (max +10).
Resets on end chapter.

name: Speedtaker
desc:
Grants +2 SPD per stack.
Lost on end of chapter.

name: Lucktaker
desc:
Grants +2 LCK after defeating a foe (max +10).
Resets on end chapter.

name: Lucktaker
desc:
Grants +2 LCK per stack.
Lost on end of chapter.

name: Defensetaker
desc:
Grants +2 DEF after defeating a foe (max +10).
Resets on end chapter.

name: Defensetaker
desc:
Grants +2 DEF per stack.
Lost on end of chapter.

name: Resistancetaker
desc:
Grants +2 RES after defeating a foe (max +10).
Resets on end chapter.

name: Resistancetaker
desc:
Grants +2 RES per stack.
Lost on end of chapter.

name: Movementtaker
desc:
Grants +1 MOV after defeating a foe (max +5).
Resets on end chapter.

name: Movementtaker
desc:
Grants +1 MOV per stack.
Lost on end of chapter.

name: Fierce Follow-Up
desc: If unit's STR >= foe's STR +5, unit can make a guaranteed follow-up attack.

name: Arcane Follow-Up
desc: If unit's MAG >= foe's MAG +5, unit can make a guaranteed follow-up attack.

name: Sturdy Follow-Up
desc: If unit's DEF >= foe's DEF +5, unit can make a guaranteed follow-up attack.

name: Warded Follow-Up
desc: If unit's RES >= foe's RES +5, unit can make a guaranteed follow-up attack.

name: Fortunate Follow-Up
desc: If unit's LCK >= foe's LCK +5, unit can make a guaranteed follow-up attack.

name: Quick Riposte
desc:
If foe initiates combat and unit's HP>50% at start of combat,
unit can make a guaranteed follow-up attack.

name: Quick Riposte
desc:
If foe initiates combat and unit's HP>50%,
unit can make a guaranteed follow-up attack.

name: Superior Swipe
desc: If unit has WTA, unit attacks twice.

name: Inferiority Swipe
desc: If unit has WTD, unit attacks twice.

name: Veteran's Experience
desc:
If unit has WTA, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot.
If unit has WTD, foe makes a guaranteed follow-up attack and foe cannot.
components: 100 if combat_calcs.compute_advantage(unit, target, unit.get_weapon(), target.get_weapon(), True).modification > 0 else 100 if combat_calcs.compute_advantage(unit, target, unit.get_weapon(), target.get_weapon(), False).modification > 0 else 0

100 if combat_calcs.compute_advantage(unit, target, unit.get_weapon(), target.get_weapon(), True).modification > 0 else 100 if combat_calcs.compute_advantage(unit, target, unit.get_weapon(), target.get_weapon(), False).modification > 0 else 0

name: Sword Guard
desc: Grants -3 damage received vs sword foes.

name: Lance Guard
desc: Grants -3 damage received vs lance foes.

name: Axe Guard
desc: Grants -3 damage received vs axe foes.

name: Bow Guard
desc: Grants -3 damage received vs bow foes.

name: Dagger Guard
desc: Grants -3 damage received vs dagger foes.

name: Tome Guard
desc: Grants -3 damage received vs tome foes.

name: Special Guard
desc: Grants -3 damage received vs monster weapon foes.

name: Vantage
desc: Unit counterattacks first if HP<50%.

name: Desperation
desc: If initiating at HP<50%, unit's follow-ups occur before foe can counter.

name: Dive Bomb
desc: If initiating and foe's HP = 100%, unit's follow-ups occur before foe can counter.

name: Paragon
desc: Doubles exp gain.

name: Discipline
desc: Doubles wexp gain.

name: Tutelage
desc: x1.5 Exp and WExp earned by adjacent allies.

name: Tutored
desc: Grants x1.5 Exp and WExp earned.

name: Fire Resonance
desc: Grants +3 ATK if within 2 spaces of a fire affinity ally.
components: len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 2) if (u is not unit and u.affinity == 'Fire')]) > 0

name: Thunder Resonance
desc: Grants +3 ATK if within 2 spaces of a thunder affinity ally.
components: len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 2) if (u is not unit and u.affinity == 'Thunder')]) > 0

name: Wind Resonance
desc: Grants +3 ATK if within 2 spaces of a wind affinity ally.
components: len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 2) if (u is not unit and u.affinity == 'Wind')]) > 0

name: Ice Resonance
desc: Grants +3 ATK if within 2 spaces of an ice affinity ally.
components: len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 2) if (u is not unit and u.affinity == 'Ice')]) > 0

name: Dark Resonance
desc: Grants +3 ATK if within 2 spaces of a dark affinity ally.
components: len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 2) if (u is not unit and u.affinity == 'Dark')]) > 0

name: Light Resonance
desc: Grants +3 ATK if within 2 spaces of a light affinity ally.
components: len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 2) if (u is not unit and u.affinity == 'Light')]) > 0

name: Resilient
desc: At start of player phase, if HP is 30% or less, restores 30% of unit's max HP.

name: Animal Friend
desc: Restores 20% of Max HP at start of turn when adjacent to a mounted ally.
components: len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 1) if (u is not unit and 'Mounted' in u.tags)]) > 0

name: Noble Charm
desc:
Grants adjacent allies +2 ATK.
If adjacent to an ally, grants Canter (2).

name: Charmed
desc: Grants +2 ATK.

name: Unalloyed Heart
desc: Grants -2 DMG received to allies within 2 spaces.

name: Unalloyed Heart
desc: Grants -2 DMG received.

name: Corroded Heart
desc: Grants +2 DMG received to enemies within 5 spaces.

name: Corroded Heart
desc: Grants +2 DMG received.

name: Armor March
desc: If unit is adjacent to an armor ally, grants MOV +2 to unit and adjacent armor units for 1 turn.
components: len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 1) if (u is not unit and 'Armor' in u.tags)]) > 0

name: Armor March
desc: Grants MOV +2.

name: Bow Range+1
desc: Grants +1 range when using bows. When attacking at max range, inflicts -20 hit.

name: Staff Range+1
desc: Grants +1 range when using staves.

name: Staff Range+2
desc: Grants +2 range when using staves.

name: Distant Counter
desc: Unit can counterattack regardless of range.

name: Close Counter
desc: Unit can counterattack at 1 range.

name: Critical Hit Next
desc: Unit's next attack will be a critical hit.

name: Critical Spiral
desc: If unit lands a critical hit, next attack gains Crit+15.

name: Critical Spiral
desc: If unit lands a critical hit, next attack gains Crit+15.

name: Trapper
desc:
Unit can place a trap at target location.
When a unit steps on trap, their move is interrupted.

name: Guts
desc: If unit is suffering from negative status, grants ATK +3.

name: Sadistic
desc: If foe is suffering from negative status, they receive 5 non-lethal damage after combat.

name: Dragonstone
desc: Grants STR +12, SKL +12, DEF +15, RES+20.

name: Powernap
desc:
Unit falls asleep for 2 turns, healing all HP
and clearing all negative status effects.

name: Sleepwalker
desc: Unit can move and avoid while sleeping, but not use items.

name: Rescue
desc: Unit is weighed down with a traveler.

name: Steal
desc: Can steal items from enemies with lower speed.

name: Locktouch
desc: Unit can opened locks without a key.

name: Anticrit
desc: Grants immunity to critical hits.

name: Crusader's Shield
desc: Reduces enemy magic damage by 25% when defending.
components: True if target.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(target, target.get_weapon()) in ('Anima, Light, Dark') and (mode == 'defense') else False

name: Follow-Up Shield
desc: If unit takes damage, decrease foe's follow-up damage by 25%.

name: Follow-Up Shield
desc: If unit takes damage, decrease foe's follow-up damage by 25%.

name: Wretched Air
desc: Grants STR +10, SKL +10, DEF +10, RES +10.

name: Demon Light
desc: Grants MAG +10, SKL +10, LCK +10, DEF +10, RES +15.

name: Ravager
desc: Grants STR +15, SKL +15, DEF +15, RES +15.

name: Dagger Master
desc:
Grants +1 ATK for every stat the enemy has debuffed.
If unit is hit by a knife, attacker also receives status effects.

name: Dagger Master
desc: Grants +1 ATK for every stat the enemy has debuffed.
components: (max(0,min(1,target.stats['STR'] - target.get_stat('STR'))) + max(0,min(1,target.stats['MAG'] - target.get_stat('MAG'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['SKL'] - target.get_stat('SKL'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['SPD'] - target.get_stat('SPD'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['LCK'] - target.get_stat('LCK'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['DEF'] - target.get_stat('DEF'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['RES'] - target.get_stat('RES'))))

name: Torch
desc: Grants increased sight range in fog of war.

name: Void Curse
desc: No exp gained for attacking this unit.

name: Miracle
desc: Unit can survive a lethal blow at 1HP (LCK% Activation).

name: Miracle
desc: Unit can survive a lethal blow at 1HP (LCK% Activation).

name: Inspiration
desc: Aura - Grants +1 damage and +1 resist to allies.

name: Inspired
desc: Grants +1 damage and +1 resist.

name: Aggravate
desc:
If Demonic hits the enemy, he will be prioritised by them during their next turn.
Excludes boss enemies.

name: Aggravated
desc: Unit will prioritise targetting Demonic.

name: Outsmart
desc: Grants ATK+3 and crit+10 for 1 turn if unit avoids an attack.

name: Outsmart
desc: Grants ATK +3 and crit +10.

name: Phlegmatic
desc: Grants Dodge +20. Grants Avoid +15 if there are no allies adjacent to unit.

name: Choleric
desc: Grants Crit+5 for every ally within 2 spaces (max +20).

name: Melancholic
desc:
If there are no allies within 2 spaces and unit initiates combat,
unit can make a follow-up attack before foe can counter.

name: Draconis Sola
desc: Grants +2 to all stats when there are no allies within 3 spaces.

name: Reassurance
desc: Grants Hit+5 during combat for every ally within 3 spaces (max +20).

name: Herd Together
desc:
At start of turn, allies within 2 spaces gain LCK+2 for 1 turn.
Grants Crit = total LCK bonuses on allies within 2 spaces.
components: sum([u.stat_bonus('LCK') for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 2) if (u is not unit and u.stat_bonus('LCK')>0)])

name: Adaptive Bearings
desc:
Grants Crit+15 at full HP during combat. 
This converts to Avoid proportional to missing HP.

name: Nervous Strike
desc: If unit is within 2 spaces of an ally, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack, but -10 hit.

name: Piercing Wit
desc: For every 2 points of SKL unit has over foe, increases damage dealt by 1.

name: Peruser
desc:
During combat, grants +10/2/2 hit/ATK/PRT for every anima/dark/light 
tome in the unit's inventory respectively (maximum of +30/6/6).
components: min(6, sum(2 for i in unit.items if item_system.weapon_type(unit, i) in ['Dark']))
min(6, sum(2 for i in unit.items if item_system.weapon_type(unit, i) in ['Light']))
min(30, sum(10 for i in unit.items if item_system.weapon_type(unit, i) in ['Anima']))

name: Invigorating Tune
desc: Grants STR/MAG/SKL +2 while refreshing an ally.

name: Invigorated
desc: Grants STR/MAG/SKL +2.

name: Indentured Aid
desc: When healing, restores HP by 50% of healed amount and grants DEF/RES +3 for 1 turn.
components: target.team == unit.team and target is not unit

name: Gratified
desc: Grants DEF/RES +3.

name: Optimistic
desc: Increases healing received by 15.

name: SwordStudent
components: sum(20 for i in unit.items if item_system.weapon_type(unit, i) in ['Sword'])

name: Guilt Trip
desc: When hurt by non-adjacent foe, reflects 50% damage and inflicts LCK-3 on them for 1 turn.

name: Guilt Trip
desc: Reflects 50% damage.

name: Guilt Trip
desc: Inflicts LCK-3.

name: Holy Retribution
desc: When hurt by adjacent foe, reflects 50% damage and inflicts LCK-3 on them for 1 turn.

name: Holy Retribution
desc: Reflects 50% damage.

name: Holy Retribution
desc: Inflicts LCK-3.

name: Mother's Instinct
desc: Allies within 4 spaces receive 2 less damage.

name: Motherly Love
desc: -2 dmg received.

name: Harmony
desc: Allies within 3 spaces heal 10% of their max HP at the start of each turn.

name: Harmony
desc: Unit heals 10% of their max HP at the start of each turn.

name: Reciprocity
desc: If unit is healed by an ally, ally restores 50% of amount healed.

name: Reciprocity
desc: If unit is healed by an ally, ally restores 50% of amount healed.

name: Hunter's Preserve
desc: Unit has a SKL% chance to not consume weapon uses.

name: Hunter's Preserve
desc: Unit has a Skl% chance to not consume weapon uses.

name: Orchid's Love
desc: Grants 50% of unit's STR/MAG/RES bonuses to allies within 2 spaces.

name: Orchid's Love
desc: Grants unit 50% of Breads's STR/MAG/RES bonuses.

name: Robust Power
desc: Doubles units STR bonuses during combat.

name: Seize Advantage
desc: Doubles targets RES penalties during combat.

name: Overcast
desc: Inflicts Avoid-10 on foes within 3 spaces.

name: Retribution
desc: +5 ATK if unit is damaged during combat.

name: Retribution
desc: +5 ATK if unit is damaged during combat.

name: Serenade
desc: Can refresh an ally.

name: Nimble Combo
desc: Unit's follow-up attacks have x1.5 Crit Rate.

name: Keen Analysis
desc: Unit gains +4 ATK against the weapon type they defeated last.

name: Analytic Findings
desc: Boosts damage against weapon types the unit has defeated this map.

name: KeenAnalysisEvent
desc: Boosts damage against weapon types the unit has defeated this map.

name: Rage
desc:
Unit gains a stack of rage every time the unit takes damage (max 6) .
Use combat art to add +1 ATK, +5 Hit/Crit, -5 Dodge per stack.

name: Rage
desc: Can release stacks of rage to add +1 ATK/5 Crit per stack.

name: Furious Smash
desc: Unit releases their rage and adds +1 ATK, +5 Hit/Crit, -5 Dodge per stack.
components: len([skill for skill in unit.skills if skill.nid == 'RageChild'])
5*(len([skill for skill in unit.skills if skill.nid == 'RageChild']) )
5*(len([skill for skill in unit.skills if skill.nid == 'RageChild']) )
-5*(len([skill for skill in unit.skills if skill.nid == 'RageChild']) )

name: Oblivious
desc: Unit is immune to negative statuses.

name: Failing Forward
desc: If unit misses an attack, deals 30% of intended damage.

name: Gluttonous
desc: Unit restores 20% of max HP at the start of their turn.

name: Cancel
desc: Unit has a SKL% chance to deny enemy counterattacks.

name: Cancel
desc: Unit has a SKL% chance to deny enemy counterattacks.

name: Canceled
desc: Unit cannot counterattack.

name: Temperamental
desc:
Grants STR/MAG+2 on odd turns, and DEF/RES+2 on even turns.
Guaranteed level-ups to stats raised by this skill.

name: Odd Tempo
desc: +2 STR/MAG, guaranteed level-ups to STR/MAG.

name: Even-Keeled
desc: +2 DEF/RES, guaranteed level-ups to DEF/RES.

name: Mood Swing
desc:
+3 damage dealt if above or at 50% HP.
-2/+2 damage dealt/received if unit is under 50% HP.

name: Momentum
desc: If unit initiates, adds (distance moved / 2) to damage.
components: max(0, utils.calculate_distance(unit.position, unit.previous_position) // 2) if unit.position and mode in ('attack', 'splash') else 0

name: Sharpshooter
desc: Gain Hit+35 and Range+1 if the unit has not moved.

name: Focused Caster
desc:
If unit has not moved, grants an effect depending on magic type used:
Anima - Range+1 / Light - Crit+30 / Dark - ATK+5.
components: 1 if unit.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(unit, item) == 'Anima' else 0
30 if unit.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(unit, item) == 'Light' else 0
5 if unit.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(unit, item) == 'Dark' else 0

name: Humiliate
desc:
Adds foe's STR bonus to damage dealt, 
inflicts +3 STR/-10 hit when striking a foe.

name: Humiliated
desc: Grants +3 STR, but -10 hit.

name: Beatdown
desc: Grants Crit+5 per stat enemy has debuffed.
components: 5 * (max(0,min(1,target.stats['STR'] - target.get_stat('STR'))) + max(0,min(1,target.stats['MAG'] - target.get_stat('MAG'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['SKL'] - target.get_stat('SKL'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['SPD'] - target.get_stat('SPD'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['LCK'] - target.get_stat('LCK'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['DEF'] - target.get_stat('DEF'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['RES'] - target.get_stat('RES'))))

name: Insult to Injury
desc: If foe has 4 or more stats debuffed, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.
components: (max(0,min(1,target.stats['STR'] - target.get_stat('STR'))) + max(0,min(1,target.stats['MAG'] - target.get_stat('MAG'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['SKL'] - target.get_stat('SKL'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['SPD'] - target.get_stat('SPD'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['LCK'] - target.get_stat('LCK'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['DEF'] - target.get_stat('DEF'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['RES'] - target.get_stat('RES')))) > 3

name: Overwhelm
desc: Grants +1 ATK per stat enemy has debuffed (excluding MOV).
components: (max(0,min(1,target.stats['STR'] - target.get_stat('STR'))) + max(0,min(1,target.stats['MAG'] - target.get_stat('MAG'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['SKL'] - target.get_stat('SKL'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['SPD'] - target.get_stat('SPD'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['LCK'] - target.get_stat('LCK'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['DEF'] - target.get_stat('DEF'))) +max(0,min(1,target.stats['RES'] - target.get_stat('RES'))))

name: Added Benefit
desc: Grants +1 ATK per stat unit has bonuses on (excluding MOV).

name: Superiority Complex
desc: Grants +1 ATK per stat unit has higher than foe.
components: (max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('STR') - target.get_stat('STR'))) + max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('MAG') - target.get_stat('MAG'))) +max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('SKL') - target.get_stat('SKL'))) +max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('SPD') - target.get_stat('SPD'))) +max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('LCK') - target.get_stat('LCK'))) +max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('DEF') - target.get_stat('DEF'))) +max(0,min(1,unit.get_stat('RES') - target.get_stat('RES'))))

name: Honourable Duel
desc: Gain +30 Hit/-30 Avoid if this unit attacks an enemy who can counterattack.

name: Opportunist
desc: Grants +4 ATK if unit attacks an enemy who cannot counterattack.
components: 4 if not combat_calcs.can_counterattack(unit, unit.get_weapon(), target, target.get_weapon()) else 0

name: Fearsome Blow
desc:
If unit initiates combat and defeats an enemy, enemies within
2 spaces of them will receive 5 damage.

name: Relaxation
desc: If unit waits, grants DEF+3 for the rest of turn.

name: Relaxed
desc: Grants DEF+3.

name: Refinement
desc:
Grants +(Weapon Uses) hit and 
(Weapon Uses / 3) crit when initiating.

name: Perfectionist
desc: Grants +15 Hit/Avoid when at full HP.

name: Shrive
desc: Foe wielding dark tomes cannot counter this unit.

name: Dazzled
desc: Unit cannot counterattack.

name: Triangle Adept
desc: Doubles weapon triangle modifiers.

name: Arcane Blade
desc:
Adds MAG to crit while initiating.
Deals +7 damage on criticals.

name: Flashing Blade
desc:
Adds SPD to crit while initiating.
Deals +7 damage on criticals.

name: Mystic Power
desc:
Grants MAG/RES +3, STR/DEF -3.
Can crit using magic weapons.

name: MYSTIC CRIT
desc: magic weapons can crit

name: Befuddle
desc: All units within 3 spaces swap their STR and MAG stats.

name: Befuddled
desc: Unit swaps their STR and MAG stats.

name: Specialist
desc: When using an effective weapon, increases the effective modifier to 4x, and grants +20 hit.
components: item.damage.value if item.effective_tag and any([tag in item.effective_tag.value for tag in target.tags]) else 0
20 if item.effective_tag and any([tag in item.effective_tag.value for tag in target.tags]) else 0
item.effective_tag and any([tag in item.effective_tag.value for tag in target.tags])

name: Prodigy
desc: Unit ignores weight penalties from tomes.
components: max(0, unit.get_weapon().weight.value - unit.get_stat('CON')) if unit.get_weapon() else 0
max(0, unit.get_weapon().weight.value - unit.get_stat('CON')) if unit.get_weapon() else 0

name: Sacrifice
desc: Can use 10 HP to heal an ally for 10 HP.

name: Heavy Strike
desc: If unit's weapon WT exceeds unit's CON, deals damage = WT - CON (Max +5).

name: Close Counter
desc: Unit can counterattack at 1 range.

name: Terra Boost
desc: Grants +4 ATK when receiving terrain bonuses.

name: Seafarer
desc: Grants +3 ATK/PRT/RSL when the terrain is water.

name: AirSuperiority
desc: Grants ATK+5 if unit is on a tile that foe cannot traverse.

name: Ambush
desc: Grants Crit+20 on initiation when receiving terrain bonuses.

name: Shifty Manners
desc: Grants Avoid+20 when receiving positive terrain bonuses.

name: Rend
desc: Critical hits deal x4 damage.

name: Dutiful Protector
desc: Unit gains +2 MOV if any allied unit has below half HP.
components: any(ally.get_hp() < ally.get_max_hp()//2 for ally in game.units if skill_system.check_ally(unit, ally))

name: Undying Oath
desc: Grants STR/SKL/SPD x 1.5 when under 50% HP.

name: Flight or Flight
desc: Grants MOV+2 and avoid+20 for 1 turn when damaged.

name: Adrenaline Rush
desc: Grants MOV+2 and avoid+20 for 1 turn.

name: Masochist
desc: Grants ATK+3 and Crit+10 for 1 turn when damaged.

name: Stimulated
desc: Grants ATK+3 and Crit+10 for 1 turn.

name: Spiteful Shield
desc:
If unit is hit by an attack, the attacker receives 5 damage after combat
(Damage is not lethal).

name: Spiteful Shield
desc: 5 Recoil

name: Assertive
desc: If unit has weapon-triangle disadvantage, unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

name: Intimidating Stature
desc:
If unit's CON > foe's CON, inflicts hit/dodge 
penalty on foe equal to the difference x3 (Max -15).

name: Devil's Luck
desc: Unit receives 5 recoil damage after combat.

name: Divine Punishment
desc: Halves foe's RES for 1 turn if unit hits foe.

name: Divine Punishment
desc: Halves unit's RES.

name: Generosity
desc: Unit's healing items gain +1 AoE.

name: GenerosityAOE
desc: Unit's healing items gain +1 AoE.

name: Blindside
desc:
If an ally is on the opposite side of the target
to unit, grants Hit/Crit+10.

name: Canter 2
desc: Can move again after certain actions, 2 spaces.

name: Isolation
desc: Unit cannot trade.

name: Klutz
desc: Grants Crit +10, Dodge -10.

name: Fortune Share
desc: Grants LCK+3 to allies within 2 spaces.

name: Contrary Strike
desc: If unit attacks a magic foe with a physical attack or vice versa, grants +3 ATK.
components: (item_funcs.is_magic(unit, unit.get_weapon()) and not item_funcs.is_magic(target, target.get_weapon())) or (not item_funcs.is_magic(unit, unit.get_weapon()) and item_funcs.is_magic(target, target.get_weapon()))

name: Fatal Finisher
desc: If initiating and damage would defeat enemy, grants Hit+40.
components: 40 if (mode in ('attack', 'splash') and combat_calcs.compute_damage(unit, target, item, target.get_weapon(), 'attack') >= target.get_hp()) else 0

name: Fair Fight
desc: Unit ignores weapon triangle. Grants +20 hit to unit and foe if they can counter.
components: 20 if (combat_calcs.can_counterattack(unit, unit.get_weapon(), target, target.get_weapon()) or combat_calcs.can_counterattack(target, target.get_weapon(), unit, unit.get_weapon())) else 0
-20 if (combat_calcs.can_counterattack(unit, unit.get_weapon(), target, target.get_weapon()) or combat_calcs.can_counterattack(target, target.get_weapon(), unit, unit.get_weapon())) else 0

name: Energizing Meal
desc: After consuming healing items, unit gains SPD+3 for 2 turns.

name: Energized
desc: SPD+3.

name: Spell Student
desc: Grants +1 ATK and Hit+5 for every adjacent tome ally.
components: len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 1) if (u is not unit and u.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(u, u.get_weapon()) in ['Anima','Light','Dark'])])
5*len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 1) if (u is not unit and u.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(u, u.get_weapon()) in ['Anima','Light','Dark'])])

name: Hexblade
desc: Targets lower of foe's DEF/RES if adjacent to a tome wielding ally.
components: len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 1) if (u is not unit and u.get_weapon() and item_system.weapon_type(u, u.get_weapon()) in ['Anima','Light','Dark'])]) > 0
(max(0,(target.get_stat('RES') - target.get_stat('DEF')))) if item_funcs.is_magic(unit, unit.get_weapon()) else (max(0,(target.get_stat('DEF') - target.get_stat('RES'))))

name: Lucky Braggart
desc: Grants +1 ATK for every ally in 2 spaces with lower LCK.
components: len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 2) if (u.get_stat('LCK') < unit.get_stat('LCK'))])

name: Deliverer
desc: Grants +2 MOV when rescuing an ally.

name: Pincer Attack
desc: If an ally is on the opposite side of the target, grants +X.

name: Stalwart
desc: If unit is between 2 enemies in a line, grants DEF/RES+2.

name: Arcane Majesty
desc:
Unit restores HP to full when defeated.
Reduces charge of this skill by 1 when defeated.

name: Fianchetto
desc:
When initiating combat, if unit
has moved directly diagonally,
add the amount of tiles moved to
ATK/PRT/RSL.
components: max(0, utils.calculate_distance(unit.position, unit.previous_position)) if not 'TrueDamage' in item.tags else 0

name: Virtuous Hero
desc: When rescuing an ally, unit attacks twice.

name: Champion
desc: If there are 3+ allies with HP<50% within 2 spaces, unit attacks twice.
components: len([u for u in get_allies_within_distance(unit, 2) if (u is not unit and u.get_hp() < u.get_max_hp()//2)]) > 2

name: Tactical Mind
desc: While foe has a terrain effect, unit gains +3 damage dealt and +20 Hit.

name: Zen Presence
desc: Foe's critical hit damage is multiplied by 2, not 3.

name: Zen Presence
desc: Foe's critical hit damage is multiplied by 2, not 3.

name: Wings of Mercy
desc: Unit can warp adjacent to any ally with HP<50%.

name: Fury
desc:
Grants all stats +2, but unit receives 6 damage after combat
(Recoil is non-lethal).

name: Transformed
desc: Unit is in dragon form, granting access to breaths.

name: Anointed One
desc:
When unit is defeated, they are revived with full HP.
Can be used twice.

name: Opening Gambit
desc: Grants STR/DEF/MOV+2 on turn 1.

name: Corrosion
desc: Units reduces item uses by 2 on use.

name: Senior Shout
desc: All units within 2 spaces suffer -10 Dodge.

name: SeniorShout
desc: Inflicts -10 Dodge.

name: Sustained Strikes
desc: If unit's AS >= foe's AS + 8, unit gains an additional follow-up attack.

name: Keen Intuition
desc: Grants +20 avoid when attacked from 2+ tiles away.

name: Scarlet Starlings
desc:
If there are more red units than purple units,
unit and allies within 4 spaces gain STR/DEF+2.

name: Scarlet Starlings
desc: If there are more red units than purple units, gain STR/SPD/DEF+2.

name: Mauve Marauders
desc:
If there are more purple units than red units,
unit and allies within 4 spaces gain STR/DEF+2.

name: Mauve Marauders
desc: If there are more purple units than red units, gain STR/SPD/DEF+2.
